text: DWHL (756 AM) Apo Radyo is a radio station owned and operated by Beta Broadcasting System. The station's studio is located at #8 Kessing St., Brgy. Asinan, Olongapo, and its transmitter is located at Brgy. Kalaklan, Olongapo.Special Kapihan ng Mamamayan on the West Philippine Sea Issue Launched in Olongapo CityAM Radio Stations in Olongapo - A Restropect It operates daily from 05:00 am to 09:00 pm, except on Holy Week annually, where it goes off the air from 09:00 pm of Holy Wednesday until 05:00 am of Easter Sunday. ==References== Category:Radio stations in Olongapo Category:News and talk radio stations in the Philippines Category:Radio stations established in 1968 Category:1968 establishments in the Philippines
title: DWHL-AM
